summary: Tested Seasonal Badge Gallery page and Challenges category requirements display. All features working correctly. Seasonal Badge Gallery loads with hero section, empty state, and navigation links. Challenges page shows category requirements badge for Valentine's Special challenge.
critical_code_review_comments: Seasonal Badge Gallery page well-structured with proper empty state handling
Category requirements display uses appropriate styling (pink background with pricetag icon)
Both pages have proper navigation links to related features
context_for_next_testing_agent: Seasonal Badge Gallery at /badges/seasonal-gallery works correctly with empty state. Challenges page at /challenges displays category requirements for Valentine's Special challenge.

verified_elements: Category requirements badge with pricetag icon
Pink background styling for category badge
Seasonal Events section header with 'LIMITED TIME' badge

api_tests.GET /api/badges/past-seasonal: 200 OK - Returns empty badges array and pagination
api_tests.GET /api/challenges: 200 OK - Returns 8 challenges including Valentine's Special with categories
